appropriations: The purpose of this measure included to "Appropriate funds out of the University of Hawaii Conference Center Revolving Fund (HB1169_CD1_CCR138_)." However, the Committee on Conference has amended this measure by "(1) Removing the appropriation (HB1169_CD1_CCR138_)."
policy_impact: A Committee on Conference met to resolve the disagreeing vote of the House of Representatives to the amendments proposed by the Senate, and after full and free discussion, has agreed to recommend the final passage of this bill in an amended form (HB1169_CD1_CCR138_). The Committee amended the measure by removing the appropriation and making technical, nonsubstantive amendments (HB1169_CD1_CCR138_). The committee is in accord with the intent and purpose of the bill as amended and recommends that it pass Final Reading as H.B. No. 1169, H.D. 1, S.D. 2, C.D. 1 (HB1169_CD1_CCR138_).
revenue_sources: On July 1, 2025, "all unencumbered funds in the conference center revolving fund and in the community college conference center revolving fund shall lapse to the credit of the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund established pursuant to section 1 of this Act (HB1169_CD1)."
updates_from_previous_fiscal_note: The bill has progressed to a Committee on Conference, which recommends that it pass Final Reading in the form attached hereto as H.B. No. 1169, H.D. 1, S.D. 2, C.D. 1 (HB1169_CD1_CCR138_). The most significant change from the previous version is that the Committee on Conference has amended this measure by "Removing the appropriation" (HB1169_CD1_CCR138_).
